website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you're looking for a longer speed ladder that's portable and easy to use.
pros: Flat plastic rungs that can be adjusted
cons: Some users have complained about the rungs being improperly spaced out upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what everyone's issue with spacing of the slats. My ladder came very close to being spaced out, but even if it hadn't, it wouldn't be that difficult to do on my own. Ladder is "cheap" as in it is plastic, but what other material would you wish it to be made from? I find the quality to be fine. The product works great, and nicely fits in the bag. Actually longer than most speed ladders I've used. I'd highly recommend this, especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This ladder has worked out wonderfully! One of the nicest features (that I was ...
customer_reviews.text: This ladder has worked out wonderfully! One of the nicest features (that I was honestly surprised about- but it may have been in the description and I missed it) was that the blocks are adjustable. This is nice when my 4 year old is "using" it. The carrying case seems to be very durable, with the ladder folding up nicely- even when spread out. I would highly recommend this ladder!
customer_reviews.author: cassie barker

customer_reviews.title: Not a good Buy for a ladder!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder only last about 4 months with my tennis training. The sides ripped. The spaces are too big. Even if you want adjust them its a hassle and when you do you end up with so much space at the end. I am really disappointed with this purchase. I thought it would be a good buy. The bag broke as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Just as Described
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It's a simple contraption of lightweight plastic and nylon it's just as pictured and the nylon carrying bag makes the price point perfect. To clarify, this is just for athletic footwork, don't go trying to climb out any windows with it or you'll be sorry. It's just as described. I'm quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is durable, well-made, and functional for my needs. As a Personal Trainer, I need equipment that does as needed for my clients. Compared to other expensive types, this ladder fits the bill and does as needed. My clients are happen, therefore I am happy. I highly recommend this exercise ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Man of Valor

customer_reviews.title: Arrived w/ Tangled Knots Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in such a ridiculous tangled mess I can’t even use it. I’ve spent nearly 30 minutes trying to untangle it, it’s like trying to solve a Rubik’s cube. I understand that these can get tangled but for it to arrive as if someone spent time tying crazy knots all over it is ridiculous. The picture I posted is AFTER spending 30 minutes trying to untangle it.
customer_reviews.author: RHINO

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly priced and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great training tool. You can spend a lot more on these, but this one is durable and heavy enough for what it's for. It folds up nicely and fits into the bag it came in, and rolls back out with no issues. It's about the size of an umbrella when it's all folded up, so it's easy to throw in a bag, the car, a suitcase, and train wherever you are.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good for practice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, she like this. It is very good for practice. Very long and you can use that for a few exercises
customer_reviews.author: Gt19

customer_reviews.title: It certainly made our workout more fun especially since all of our drills prior have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Today as in 5/18/17 my trainee and I were working on quickness drills for the first time with a ladder. It certainly made our workout more fun especially since all of our drills prior have been without a ladder. Here's the thing. I don't know how durable the ladder is against cleats. My trainee and I were using tennis shoes because I feared of the possibility of the yellow plastic snapping. So if you use cleats, you might possibly chance breaking the plastic. Though when using tennis shoes, we did not have any problems. Hope this helps. We plan on continuing more ladder drills to help us become quicker. Moreso for my trainee, but I like running fast too.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little cheesy compared to the one at my gym, but for the money it’s a great deal. The rungs need to be adjusted. They are completely inconsistent in size from one to the next. I just need to find a time to measure and slide them all to the right distances. This came in very handy as I am now working out, barely, at home during Quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: wendy g

customer_reviews.title: I wish there was a zero stars rating. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a zero stars rating. The slats do not come spaced, and the rope is absurdly long if you try to evenly space them. It would literally take hours to evenly space the slats. Cannot believe they sell an agility ladder that does not come pre-spaced. The frustration is not worth it. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: BHZhen

customer_reviews.title: Works great at a better price than large sporting good store whos name gets me flagged
customer_reviews.text: My first attempt at a review was disallowed for violating a rule which I did not do. I stated that I bought this on Amazon from this seller and am very happy. My friend purchased it from a store with a NAME that is probably why your robots disallowed my comment, and paid 3x more. So this is the way to go if you need one of these ladders. Same exact one they sell at the store for more.
customer_reviews.author: Kalanis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews said was very difficult to adjust. Or that came in shambles. I opened the package. Unwrapped them and was already assembled and perfect!! Me and my friend set it up and started using it right away. So many exercises you can do with this ladder. The feel and quality is really nice . Especially for $11.99!! Really nice length to it. My friend and I take a boxing class and the ladder is part of the drills we do. Would eventually like to get a 2nd one. There are similar looking products, but I'm very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This speed and agility ladder was a good purchase. Very long and seems like pretty sturdy plastic. I have had issues getting it back in the travel bag and also had some tangling issues so be strategic on how you open it and put it away.
customer_reviews.author: Robin James

customer_reviews.title: Spacing is a little time-consuming but not that difficult
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed that these were not pre-spaced and there are no directions as it is a bit time-consuming to do it yourself. It took me and my daughter a total of about 15 minutes once we calculated the spacing. Simply stretch the nylon out straight, and have someone on each side as you move each rung to the other end. There are 12 rungs and 18 feet of nylon. Space them every 18 inches. My daughter is already having fun using it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: This ladder will work out pretty good for kids, but probably a bit too small for adults. We use it for our 14 year old daughter. We use it indoors and it moves too easily, there is no way to attach it to the floor and we've almost had a few nasty spills. It also gets tangled easily, so be careful picking it up when you're done with it. For the price range, they will all be about the same, so take care of it and tape it to floors so you don't get hurt and you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: HonestlySpeakingDez

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price. Good workout/ training equipment
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for training and already set up. All you have to do is roll in out. Roll it back up easily, plop it in the bag and off you go. You can use it as a novice looking to do aerobics or as an athlete looking to gain agility and foot skills. There are literally thousands of exercises you can do with this...just you tube them. And you can use it anywhere the bag it comes with makes it super convenient to take anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: abby binder

customer_reviews.title: Not substantial enough for heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few months now with the basketball teams I train. The ladder rungs move way too easily and the whole thing is just too flimsy and light. So if you're using it indoors where you can't stake it down it won't stay put. Annoying for athletes, semi dangerous for beginners who are still learning movement patterns because if they toe the ladder at all it will just bunch up and cause a tripping hazard.
customer_reviews.author: G. G.

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The ladders are light weight and easy to transport. I purchased two to connect them together for a longer run. The rungs move and slip sometimes during drills I have to Readjust In the middle which can be distracting. I also have respace them before each use even though I set them and store in the bag they came in. It’s a good value for the money and would recommend for the price and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: N. Woodyard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a volleyball player who was recovering from an ACL+LCL surgery at the time when I bought these ladders. I got them so I could work on my coordination and agility outside of physical therapy. I didn't need anything fancy looking or super expensive, I just wanted that something so I can work out. They are very light which is a plus and the color is really nice and vibrant. Also, I believe they are a good length as well. Hope this review helps someone decide whether to buy them or not!
customer_reviews.author: TinaS

customer_reviews.title: Super Agility Ladder
customer_reviews.text: This agility ladder is great for 2 reasons. It’s light & folds up to carry in a soccer bag, but made well to where it stays in place when in use. My daughter has really put it to use. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fran B.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Use this with my first time basketball girls. elementary school kids loved it when I pulled this out of the bag very fun way to get in shape and work on footwork. only complaint is that it tangles very easily and it is annoying to try to get it in that small cute bag
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought for soccer practice. Big mistake! Kids tripped on it, ladders did not stay in place, And it’s a disaster to use on the grass whereas it’s better to use on a gym floor. Will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: Trumpet Player

customer_reviews.title: Agility ladder
customer_reviews.text: I used this ladder the very next day after receiving it! Worked great. Like that the ladder is adjustable. I do wish the ladder was a little bit wider. The straps are wearing already but overall it's a great ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: bad product, the yellow lines kept moving and i had to keep adjusting each of them whenever i wanted to use it. i play football, if you want to seriously get work done on a speed ladder i would suggest the sklz brand one, much better product.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Lam

customer_reviews.title: Nice Workout Ladder - Soccer Coach
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a decent workout ladder for my soccer team. Did not want to spend a ton of money but still to have one that is sturdy and durable. I purchased two of them and they are great and have held up. The carrying case is nice for storage so it is not tangled up in back up going to the next practice session.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great durable product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my nephews football training and they love it. It is also quite durable because they leave. It outside a lot and the rain and other elements have not affected it one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nique

customer_reviews.title: It seems well made, very portable.
customer_reviews.text: Having never had one of these before I don't have much of a context for it. that said it seems to me that if it were a little bit heavier it would lay down and stay down better. If I step on any of it it's immediately out of alignment and I have to straighten it again. Maybe if the wrongs were a bit heavier it would lay down better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Functional but visually annoying
customer_reviews.text: Just like everyone else has said;it is impossible to untangle the ladder once it’s been twisted and tangled. You’ll just have to live with the straps being twisted around permanently. Other than the unpleasant visual, the ladder is still functional and serves its purpose fine. As for the ladder being too light; it just means you have to work harder to not step the ladder while training. I make my students do 5 squats as a group, for every time someone steps on or messes up the ladder.
customer_reviews.author: joe leung

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered quick and just as specified. It is a little hard to lay out but that's ok and I think they probably all are like that. Can't be happier - well, only if the softball star I bought it for would use it a little more :)
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to find variety in my interval workouts, and this ladder was a great (small) investment. The rungs were already well spaced, and it was a perfect fit for a workout on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: kfinn4

customer_reviews.title: The kids absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: The kids absolutely love this!!!! I bought two of them. I watch a large group of kids while their parents have a Bible Study. I have team races going on, and the kids have promoted parents versus kids races....great fun and great exercise too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stead

customer_reviews.title: its a really good agility ladder
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can;t beat it. Its VERY long and extremely light and can get tangled on itself, so setting up on grass will take a bit of time but once you get the hang out it, its a really good agility ladder, and since its lightweight it can easily be set up in the house as well.
customer_reviews.author: Milweiser

customer_reviews.title: Need weights to keep it still
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it does it's job but it moves constantly so we had to place weights on the end of it to keep it still. It's very lightweight. But other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: ShayMarie

customer_reviews.title: Bad product. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. The ladder tangled so bad that we had to cut it apart. Peace of junk.
customer_reviews.author: florihei

customer_reviews.title: Bag torn but overall happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Got the ladder today. It’s a lot longer than I though and am looking forward to using it. I was a little disappointed that the bag came with a hole in it. Don’t think it will last more than a couple times taking it in and out.
customer_reviews.author: sapphire1968

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent for what you need. I’d say the price is worth what you get. It’s not great and could fall apart for lots of use but I’m. It going to use it a lot. Roles up nice and comes with a bag. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Pcrecycler_net

customer_reviews.title: GHB Pro Agility ladder training ladder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she seems to love it, great for making a boring workout more fun. if you one for on the go this works for her it will work for you too.
customer_reviews.author: James Parris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.....tangled mess
customer_reviews.text: Tangled Garbage. I firmly believe those that have not experienced this have not used it enough. The construction of this ladder makes this inevitable bc the yellow plastic rungs are too long and rigid to restore to its correct shape after storage. The price might look good but now I have to buy another one version of this plus I am out the money I paid for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnjohn

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a lot of ladders and this one is the most difficult to get to lay flat. I’m going to have to replace it simply because it’s a hazard to use with kids.
customer_reviews.author: brittney

customer_reviews.title: Got a carrying case with it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple item, so it is hard to get it wrong. However, I really appreciate the carrying bag that comes with the training ladder. It keeps it clean and makes it very easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Mogadishu 207

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected for the price that it would be a little more cheaply made but I was pleasantly surprised at how big it was and the quality of it. Great for practice!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Trout

customer_reviews.title: Great basic ladder
customer_reviews.text: basic agility ladder works exactly how it should. it lies flat which is nice. It could be a little thicker on the straps to make it stay down a bit better but I have 0 issues with for the price point it was, ordered a Second one today. 100% worth it
customer_reviews.author: YogaGirlCT

customer_reviews.title: The Right Steps.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, plastic, portable and has held-up to lots of mid-steps. Need oderly folds to get back into provided storage bag, so patience is also part of the possible training you will get. Update: I don’t use it much but the ropes are tearing. A little disappointed but for the price I would still do it again.
customer_reviews.author: beagle47

customer_reviews.title: Great workout tool
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this everyday for his workouts. He has packed it with him on trips in the accompanying travel bag . He is 13 and the ease of folding it up and packing it away was a big deal for him.
customer_reviews.author: Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: A newly added piece to add to my workout routine and it works great! The bag that comes with it, makes it easy to store and carry with you to wherever you need to use it. I only wish it had some time of suction or something that would keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio J. Lazaro

customer_reviews.title: Oh well
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the material. The bars a too close and it’s a tighter box for adults to exercise. But I am using for kids though I would have preferred that I also could have used it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like it because of the price, but it was more like a hazard to use it. I had to return it and get a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Coastie V

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous buy!
customer_reviews.text: So very useful!! Good quality. Good price. Got this for my daughter (6 yrs old) to do some fitness drills this summer. She already loves it before we’ve even got started!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Why did you tangle it all its impossible to untangle.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this for lacrosse and soccer to improve my foot speed. I'm sure its great, but I am annoyed. It came super tangled like they didn't even care. I can not untangle it neither can anyone els I asked. I mean I could do it in like a week but who got that time. very unhappy. They should post like organizing straps to stop it from getting tangled. Its stupid that I have to work this hard and can't even use it. wast of money.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Bad ladder DO NOT BUT
customer_reviews.text: Horrible ladder for the price I haven’t had this ladder for 3 weeks and it already got tangled fast the adjustable squares come undone and not even squares horable for people of are committed to a sport! Bad quality in general
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: This ladder does what it needs. Nothing fancy. ...
customer_reviews.text: This ladder does what it needs. Nothing fancy. Just fyi when you get it all the rings will be together so you have to straighten it out and adjust the distances between rungs yourself. That's my only draw back but I couldn't tell you if the others do this as well or not. But that's all that's giving it 5 stars. Other than that it works as said.
customer_reviews.author: C Green

customer_reviews.title: Wish it can stay in place
customer_reviews.text: If you mess up and step on it, it will move out of alignment. Wish it had some picks or somthing to hold it down. Still a good buy i guess
customer_reviews.author: kyang

customer_reviews.title: Not A Good Ladder!
customer_reviews.text: A tangled mess! This ladder gets tangled SO easily. The yellow pieces are thick hard plastic that are easily tripped over. I’m buying a ladder with flat nylon rungs instead. That doesn’t get tangled
customer_reviews.author: Megan Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and amazing for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and amazing for the money, came pretty tangled and twisted and i was only able to fix most of the tangles, the others are still there and was left too much room between each line so i had to tighten it but it left a lot of excess black line after. Still very good and durable quality. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Brayden M

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality but I guess I was looking for the paper in the picture that showed different ways to use it but there isn’t one. Google will work just fine for that though.
customer_reviews.author: TheLastUnicorn

customer_reviews.title: I like the ladder
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize when I ordered that the ladder was not already spaced for use - We had to unroll and try to spread the rungs out ourselves - we're still working on making sure it's even. I'll be honest, I like the ladder, but I wish it would have been assembled prior.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dammann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: These are great, especially for the price! Use them for a kids boxing class for warm up drills and they are standing the test of time and heavy use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Crusher

customer_reviews.title: quick feet!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my flag football team to work on footwork. Works great. My only issue is the straps tend to twist and the thing gets crooked and goofed up then.
customer_reviews.author: lawdog

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's a ladder. I wish the yellow things were fixed in place though as they can move on the black "rails".
customer_reviews.author: Pappas

customer_reviews.title: A amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is fun to use, has a reasonable price, and is adjustable to different sizes! It is perfect for training and can be used indoors or outdoors. I and my family are in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: herman

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: A great durable agility ladder. My kid loves this and its a good way to keep in shape during lockdown
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Fitness Ladder
customer_reviews.text: Great Fitness Ladder - Perfect size to carry with you everywhere. It came nicely package and it was very easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: For the small amount of money paid for this item, it's a GREAT deal. I use it often and so do the kids. It's good indoors and outside on grass and on the sidewalk. Best exercise equipment ever bought online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 12U Soccer training
customer_reviews.text: I’m a soccer coach to 12U boys and we use this weekly and it’s great. I do a lot of different drills with and without the ball on these.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Borges

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality and I like the bag that comes with it for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: D. DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a youth soccer team. It’s easy to set up, easy to use, and simple to put away. The bag it comes in is handy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We've been running our 10u Fall Baseball Ball team through agility drills and we bought a couple of these ladders. Definitely a good idea. They are good quality and seem to be a useful training tool. Light weight and they come in a bag for easy carrying and storage. Pleased with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: Richard Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled, during these times my sons use doing basketball workouts
customer_reviews.author: t bates

customer_reviews.title: Quick feet
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. I use it to mix up my cardio. I also play sand vball which will hopefully step up my quickness. I was surprised at how inexpensive it was. Its flimsy and plastic but the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: grabes22vb

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a nice item. Ours had and issue.
customer_reviews.text: Came out of the box all tangled up and we could get it untangled. Sending it back Monday.
customer_reviews.author: Jcrumpton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: So if your workout routine requires endurance, this Jacobs ladder is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Gussygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Straps are strong. The rungs in the ladder are light plastic so they move a bit but it works great,exactly like advertised. For $11 This is perfect for anyone trying to get started with agility drills and not spend much money.
customer_reviews.author: William K.

customer_reviews.title: My sons favorite soccer drill
customer_reviews.text: My son is in soccer and I wanted to run some At home drills to help with his footwork. This has honestly been helping him so much I can see his improvement. Also it is not a drag he enjoys using this in the practice. Especially right now with quarantine I did not want him to have a setback with his soccer skills.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Reynaga

customer_reviews.title: Longer than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was actually alot longer than I expected it! fit across the width of a basketball court perfect for my softball team!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This product is as advertised. My son uses it to train for football. Easy to fold up and take with you.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tracking speed and motion
customer_reviews.text: I used this ladder for Shaun T's Insanity Asylum. It's great for speed and agility. It does not come fully assembled so you can measure out how much distance you need between rungs. It also comes with a bag to carry it in.
customer_reviews.author: Terrica L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the money. I’ve spent 2 or 3 times the money on similar products which were not much better in terms of quality. If ur looking for an inexpensive agility ladder of good quality this is it!
customer_reviews.author: jdkicks

customer_reviews.title: Gets tangled, not good for transporting from place to place or to be stored away
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product, but it's almost impossible to keep untagled. Would be best if left stationary, rather than transported.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Israel

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Longer than what we expected and a little light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son in college. Not sure about about questions but he says he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Good for runners and helping kids have quick feet.
customer_reviews.text: Love that it can be adjusted as how many steps you want to jump in.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great agility ladder
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is overall great. Just be careful with the plastic parts, seems it can crack or break if stepped on to hard, etc. Other than that, No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: L-A

customer_reviews.title: He likes it !
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present for my football playing boyfriend. He says he loves it. Bigger than what he's use to, but still gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Monae

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff! Train-away
customer_reviews.text: Good ladder, bough two, in use since purchased. Great for training, tangle easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jjitsoo

customer_reviews.title: Once untangled it’s fine
customer_reviews.text: Could not give 5 stars because the ladder came very tangled up. It took a while to be able to intangle it and it was such a headache. Once untangled my son has been enjoying using it.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Great ladder for the price. Only thing missing that would be good if it came with is the stakes to stick to ground, but all in all a good ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Jata1908

customer_reviews.title: Agility/training foldable ladder.
customer_reviews.text: No assembly needed. Using it to improve mobility/agility/stability. Will order another one for my grandson who is playing soccer to use for step training.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Used this product last weekend at my home. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price.
customer_reviews.text: It has done the job. I ended up purchasing 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Teague Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder for my 8 year old to practice his ...
customer_reviews.text: Great ladder for my 8 year old to practice his agility drills for soccer. Takes a while to set up at first for spacing but stays in place and folds up easily once you get it completed. Highly recommend for the price!
customer_reviews.author: B. Ram

customer_reviews.title: Useless because it’s tangled!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this. My son used it one time, put it in the bag, and now it’s so tangled that none of us can get it straightened out. We have tried and tried. It’s useless now and will have to be trashed. There’s NO way anyone could rate this product well.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is okay. The rungs are adjustable but it becomes a hassle adjusting one rung and then all of the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: C&H

customer_reviews.title: It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great sports thing to get faster. It's just great.
customer_reviews.author: Gab, Kellan, Grady, Ryan T

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Folds up easily to carry around. Can lay it out easily. good length
customer_reviews.author: Michael Logan

customer_reviews.title: Gets tangled easily
customer_reviews.text: While I love how I can easily adjust the distance of each rung of the ladder, I find it very frustrating that I have to untwist it so much to lay it out. Nice to have a bag with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6 year old for football training purposes. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Topp

customer_reviews.title: Soccer team loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cart bag it comes with. Can adjust the ladder to make it bigger or smaller squares. Use this for my soccer team! Next time I would deff buy 2!
customer_reviews.author: Tina love

customer_reviews.title: Good for HIIT!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Definitely adds some intensity to my workout regimen. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: M Vauters

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up on time and exceeded my expectations. I use it to coach my junior flag football team and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Courey

product_meta.title: GHB Pro Agility Ladder Agility Training Ladder Speed 12 Rung 20ft with Carrying Bag
feature_bullets: 【12 Rungs & 20 Feet】The agility ladder comes with 12 durable plastic rungs, and the overall length is 20 feet.
【Adjustable Rung Design】Each rung is 16.5" long, and the space between rungs is adjustable up to 15" inch. You can simple adjust it in the nylon straps so as to meet your workout demands.
【Carrying Bag】The agility ladder comes with a carrying bag, which is very convenient for you to train anytime anywhere.

【Ideal Tool for Outdoor Sports】The agility ladder is very helpful for footbald, soccer, basketball drills, hockey, tennis, etc as it can increase your speed, leg strength and improve your balance ability.

【Improve Performance & Skills】This speed training ladder is great tool for you to improve quickness through accelerated foot strike and lift frequency. It also can help losing weight as it can TORCH CALORIES bigtime.
